amendment.description: To provide for a 10-year extension of the assault weapons ban.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2637 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 24.

action.text: Amendment SA 2637 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S1951-1959, S1971; text: CR S1951) To provide for a 10-year extension of the assault weapons ban.
